rules_text:
Flash
When Caryn, Dismissive Prodigy enters the battlefield, you may counter target spell with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of cards in your hand. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner’s library instead of into that player’s graveyard.
notes:
2k17
Uncommon > Rare
Name: Dismissive Prodigy > Caryn, Dismissive Prodigy
Type: +Legendary
Cost: XUU > 3UU
equal to the value of X as you cast Caryn, Dismissive Prodigy. > less than or equal to the number of cards in your hand
Added: If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner’s library instead of into that player’s graveyard.
0/4 > 2/3

fluffy: spell if its converted mana cost is —> spell with converted mana cost (Wrangle, Fatal Push is an exception because its cap value changes)
